drawioeditor-desc: draw.io flow chart creation and inline editing
apihelp-drawioeditor-save-diagram-summar: Uploads a Drawio diagram to the wiki as a file.
apihelp-drawioeditor-save-diagram-param-: The file to upload, provided as a binary upload.
drawioeditor-approved-editwarning: Please note that you are now editing the latest revision of this diagram, which is not the approved one shown by default.
drawioeditor-approved-displaywarning: This is the approved revision of the diagram and not the latest revision.
drawioeditor-noapproved: The diagram $1 has no approved revision.
drawioeditor-approve-link: Click here to approve a revision
drawioeditor-changeapprove-link: Click here to change the approved revision for this diagram
drawioeditor-ve-drawio-tag-name-help: Name of the diagram as stored in the wiki
drawioeditor-ve-drawio-alt-help: Text displayed when image doesn't load or for assistive devices
drawioeditor-config-backendurl-help: The base URL of the diagrams.net (formerly draw.io) backend service used for editing diagrams
drawioeditor-ve-drawio-alignment-help: Horizontal alignment of the image on the page
drawioeditor-ve-drawio-editmode-help: Choose how the diagram editor is displayed
